Room.Name: Avatar Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Avatar Boulevard, between the Bushman Ranch and the Plantation.
Room.LongDescription: The vast plantation of the Bushman Estate is located to the west of the road. On the east, you can see the Bushman Ranch and House, where the Bushman Family runs their agricultural operation. Additionally, they raise and nurture horses and other domesticated animals on their ranch to be used and sold as needed.
